soulessences:ExhaustedPower.NAME: Exhausted
DESCRIPTIONS: % of your max HP as #yBlock, set your base [E] to #b
. NL Effects that add [E] will still applies.

soulessences:ChargingPower.NAME: Charging
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal #b30 damage at the end of your turn after #b3 turns.

soulessences:EnragedPower.NAME: Enraged
DESCRIPTIONS: Give #b3 #yStrength and Lose #b3 #yDexterity if any of the enemies does not intent to attack.

soulessences:MitosisPower.NAME: Mitosis
DESCRIPTIONS: Activates when at or under #b50% of your max HP.
When taking unblocked damage, #ysoulessences:Summon a #bSlime #bMinion to help you.
